opinion.posture: Equity. Before WILLIAMS, P.J., without a jury. Adjudication filed dismissing complaint and exceptions thereto by plaintiff dismissed and final decree entered. Plaintiff appealed. Appeal, No. 678, Oct. T., 1976, from Court of Common Pleas of Bradford County, Jan. T., 1974, No. 1. Argued June 17, 1976.
opinion.attorneys: Michael J. DeSisti, with him David B. Keeffe, for appellant; W. Marshall, Dawsey, with him Griffin and Dawsey, for appellee.
